attributes.action: Re-visit the current proposals for selection of Junior Doctors in this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I consider the above to be a puplic out cry ! The future of the NHS depends on excellent Training and the proper recruitment of Doctors. It would appear that the current system in place is ludicrous and negligent !The Goverments recent statement for the future of the NHS and the public who depend on it, contridicts one to many intentions for the NHS in my opioion. (If at all this counts!)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
